name: Mystery Hogwarts - Secret Room
description:
You are in a Mysterious room hidden in Hogwarts! The only way out is through the locked door, and the room is filled with flying keys. You have to catch the right key and deliver it to the door. Attention, the keys can resist!

Download PC version:
Unpacked files: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1ZQRbcDCsW7LNNBs0HcXgJAtWbg8qmbzD?usp=sha...
or ZIP archives x86-x64: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1_io9mh6YBTpvuK1ZJN5t-Z4dBRE4_8LJ?usp=sha...
